mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO sys_role_user(role_id, authority_id) VALUES (#{roleId}, #{authorityId})
mapper.select:
SELECT auth.* FROM sys_authority AS auth
INNER JOIN sys_role_authority AS ra ON ra.authority_id = auth.id
WHERE
ra.role_id = #{roleId}
auth.id NOT IN ( SELECT ra.authority_id FROM sys_role_authority AS ra WHERE ra.role_id = #{roleId} )
AND LOCATE(#{condition.name}, auth.name) > 0
ORDER BY auth.created_at ASC
